cmeclax po'u le cmevi'u ke'umri <cmeclax@gmx.co.uk> [2002-08-02 19:19:55 -0=
400]:
> I added code to my procmailrc (on the other account) so that anything tha=
t=20
> comes on Bugtraq and is in Razor is revoked. Bugtraq is moderated, so spa=
m=20
> doesn't get through it. The recipe revoked a message about an hour after =
I=20
> added it.

The problem with automatic revoke is the same as with automatic
report.  If spammers spoof a From: Bugtraq address then their spam is
automatically revoked by you.

Bob

--sm4nu43k4a2Rpi4c
